Uses of Class
com.here.android.mpa.ar.ARController.UpViewParams

  • Packages that use ARController.UpViewParams 
    Package Description
    com.here.android.mpa.ar
    The AR package provides classes, interfaces and enumerations for displaying LiveSight and customizing the experience.

    • Uses of ARController.UpViewParams in com.here.android.mpa.ar

      Fields in com.here.android.mpa.ar declared as ARController.UpViewParams 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      ARController.UpViewParams ARController.UpViewParams
      Accessor for ARController.UpViewParams instance.
      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.ar that return ARController.UpViewParams 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ARController.UpViewParams ARController.UpViewParams.setCameraFrameMaxZoomScale(float value)
      Sets Max zoom scale as increase from the original to be used when pulled in UP view
      ARController.UpViewParams ARController.UpViewParams.setCameraFrameZoomEnabled(boolean enable)
      Enables or disables camera frame zoom, when pushed or pulled in LiveSight
      ARController.UpViewParams ARController.UpViewParams.setPanEnabled(boolean enable)
      Enables or disables pan gesture in UP view
      ARController.UpViewParams ARController.UpViewParams.setPinchEnabled(boolean enable)
      Enables or disables pinch gesture in UP view
      ARController.UpViewParams ARController.UpViewParams.setPitchLocked(boolean locked)
      Enable/disable locked pitch in UP view
      ARController.UpViewParams ARController.UpViewParams.setPitchThreshold(float value)
      Set Pitch threshold when Down view transitions to Up View
      ARController.UpViewParams ARController.UpViewParams.setShowGridEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enable/disable showing the bottom plane grid in UP view
